Course Description: THIS COURSE PRESENTS A STUDY OF ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES AND ASSUMPTIONS UNDERLYING THE THEORIES OF MATCHING COSTS AND REVENUES TO DETERMINE INCOME AND FINANCIAL POSITION., STRESSES ASSET ACQUISITION, VALUATION, AND ALLOCATION AND ENCOURAGES CRITICAL EVALUATION FOR EXISTING ACCOUNTING THEORY AND PRACTICES.
Textbook(s): INTERMEDIATE ACCOUNTING, 12TH EDITION, KIESO AND WEYGANDT, JOHN WILEY AND SONS.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
